thread.title: City of Athens scammed out of more than $700K
thread.title_full: City of Athens scammed out of more than $700K

author: JIM PHILLIPS APG Media
title: City of Athens scammed out of more than $700K
text:
The city of Athens has lost over $700,000 to a scam in which the anonymous alleged perpetrators got electronic access to funds in a city bank account by impersonating a construction firm that contracts with the city.
